description: Priority-based mapping of system artifacts (ID, Path, Tag) to defined constraint profiles. Used by the GAX validation engine (v94.1+) for dynamic strictness enforcement. Version 3.0 introduces explicit activity toggles, structured notes, and supported match type declarations.

mappings.notes: Ensures minimal latency constraints for primary synchronization loop.
Catch-all for infrastructure components supporting heavy I/O workloads.
Balancing resource efficiency against long-term storage viability.
Standard security profile for intra-system communication channels.
Redundant rule, disabled in favor of PATH_REGEX (priority 70) for broader coverage.
Default minimum constraint requirements for unmapped components.
